Whips off his headphones and responds promptly when called by family members.
Avoids packing his bag for school, indicating avoidance or procrastination.

Responds quickly to calls and tries to pack his bag rapidly at the last moment.
Responds politely and warmly to old friends greeting him on the street, showing friendliness and sincerity.

Edging away from his dad's offer of a ride and insisting he'll walk, showing independence and confidence.
